subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Shane Victorino hit a tie-breaking, two-run homer in the eighth inning Monday night, leading the Philadelphia Phillies to a 3-2 victory over the host Cincinnati Reds.
snippet: Shane Victorino hit a tie-breaking, two-run homer in the eighth inning Monday night, leading the Philadelphia Phillies to a 3-2 victory over the host Cincinnati Reds.
